Data Deletion Instructions

At PetVault, we respect your right to control your personal data. This page explains how to request deletion of your account and all associated data from our system.

What Data Will Be Deleted?

When you request account deletion, the following information will be permanently removed:

  • Your account information (email, name, profile)
  • All pet records (names, breeds, dates of birth, notes)
  • All uploaded documents (veterinary records, vaccination records)
  • All photos and files associated with your account
  • Usage history and preferences
⚠️ Important: Data deletion is permanent and cannot be undone. Please make sure to download any important documents or information before requesting deletion.

Method 1: Delete Account Within the App

You can delete your account directly from the PetVault app:

Step 1: Open the PetVault app and log in to your account
Step 2: Go to Settings or Profile section
Step 3: Look for "Account Settings" or "Privacy Settings"
Step 4: Select "Delete Account" or "Delete My Data"
Step 5: Confirm your decision by following the on-screen prompts

Method 2: Request Deletion via Email

If you prefer, you can request account deletion by contacting us directly:

Contact Information

Email: cwilson31@gmail.com

Subject Line: "PetVault Account Deletion Request"

Required Information:

  • Your full name
  • Email address associated with your PetVault account
  • Confirmation that you want to permanently delete your account and all data

Method 3: Delete Data from Social Login Providers

If you signed up using Google or Facebook, you can also manage your data through those platforms:

For Google Sign-In:

  1. Visit your Google Account Permissions
  2. Find "PetVault" in the list of connected apps
  3. Click "Remove Access" to revoke PetVault's access to your Google account
  4. Then contact us at cwilson31@gmail.com to request full data deletion

For Facebook Login:

  1. Go to Facebook Settings > Apps and Websites
  2. Find "PetVault" in the list
  3. Click "Remove" to disconnect the app
  4. Then contact us at cwilson31@gmail.com to request full data deletion

Data Deletion Timeline

Once we receive your deletion request:

  • Immediate: Your account will be deactivated and you will no longer be able to log in
  • Within 30 days: All your personal data will be permanently deleted from our systems
  • Backup systems: Data in backup systems will be deleted within 90 days
Note: Some information may be retained if required by law or for legitimate business purposes (e.g., financial records for tax compliance), but this will be limited to the minimum necessary and will not include your pet records or uploaded documents.

What Happens After Deletion?

  • You will receive a confirmation email once the deletion is complete
  • You will no longer be able to log in to PetVault with your previous credentials
  • All your data will be permanently removed and cannot be recovered
  • If you wish to use PetVault again in the future, you will need to create a new account

Questions or Concerns?

If you have any questions about the data deletion process or need assistance, please contact us:

Email: cwilson31@gmail.com

Company: Absolute Promotional

We typically respond to deletion requests within 1-2 business days.

Your Privacy Rights

For more information about how we handle your data, please review our Privacy Policy.

Under various privacy laws (including GDPR, CCPA), you have the right to:

  • Request a copy of your data
  • Correct inaccurate data
  • Delete your data
  • Restrict or object to data processing
  • Data portability
